FOCS Programme

Programme Overview

The Faculty of Computing and Information Technology (FOCS) offers a wide range of programmes in the areas of Information Technology, Software Engineering, Computer Science, Information Systems, Multimedia, Computer Engineering, and Computer Networking.

Struggling to choose between multiple programs? Explore and Compare FOCS IT Courses to Discover Your Best Fit!
